about.title: Why Raduga?
about.feature1.title: Nature
about.feature1.desc: Excellent sandy beach, safe gentle shoreline, always warm water on the Samarka coast of the Bukhtarma Reservoir, away from the hustle in fresh air
about.feature2.title: Family-friendly
about.feature2.desc: Mini-zoo, cycling and SUP-board rides, children's playgrounds, volleyball and basketball courts, table tennis, board games — entertainment for all ages
about.feature3.title: Comfort
about.feature3.desc: Cosy fully equipped houses, kazan-grill at every house, equipped terraces, free Starlink internet and TV
about.feature4.title: Safety
about.feature4.desc: 24/7 security, CCTV, fire safety equipment, compliance with sanitary standards for drinking water, reservoir water and soil testing

tours.subtitle: Discover the beauty of East Kazakhstan
tours.kiin.title: Kiin Kerish and Lake Zaisan
tours.kiin.desc: Discover the mysterious world of Kiin-Kerish and Lake Zaisan — places where the history of the Earth comes alive, and legends intertwine with ancient landscapes!

reviews.title: Guest Reviews
reviews.r1.text: Thank you so much for your hospitality, the wonderful conditions for guests, and an amazing vacation. Everyone who visited me was absolutely delighted with your wonderful resort. I'm planning to come back next year, for sure!
reviews.r2.text: Such a pleasant Groundhog Day. My daughter says she's gotten used to the resort and doesn't want to leave. I think I need to work harder and rent a cottage not for 20 days, but for a longer period.
reviews.r3.text: So adorable, my daughter squealed with delight when she saw the farm. All the animals are well-groomed, well-fed, and the enclosures are in great condition.
